Package fr.escape.game.entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collisionable
    An interface for Entity which can collide which another Entity.
    CollisionBehavior
    An interface for Behavior when Collisionable#collision(fr.escape.game.User, int, Entity, int) happened.
    Drawable
    An interface for Entity which can draw/render themselves without external help.
    Entity
    An Entity is a Components in the World.
    Moveable
    An interface for Moveable Entity.
    Updateable
    An interface for Entity which can update themselves without external help.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollisionDetector
    This class implements ContactListener.
    CoordinateConverter
    A static class which convert some Graphics Coordinate to World Coordinate for Entity, and vice versa.
    EntityContainer
    A composite which handle large bunch of Entity, a container for Entity in the World.
